response: Its already in English

context: Can you play wii fit with this?
response: You can play any game that you can play on a regular wii.  The only difference is that you can not connect to the Internet.

context: Does this game require the Wii Plus remote or can it be played without it?
response: Hi there...it can be played with either remote..i have used both of them..i find the smaller remote easier to handle when playing the game though.

context: Is it backwards compatible?
response: yes as long as the model number is CECHA01

context: What systems do these work with? or just PC?
response: Works with ps4 and Xbox one (with headset adapter)

context: Does this version come with the new pre-order rewards?
response: How about guest passes?

context: There is a statement that you can see others "high" scores to compare, is this an online game?
response: You don't need to be online to play; but to see others "high" scores you need to be connected to online.

context: Can you play 2 player (LAN) with 1 DVD or does each player need a DVD?
response: Ben, I'm sorry but I don't know.  I have only played 1 player.  However, I believe you can play 2 player on 1 DVD.

context: is the aerosoft  pmdg 737 ngx the same as pmdg 737 ngx
response: yes it is pmdg build the program and aerosoft market it, when purchased always go the pmdg.com website for support and aircraft liveries.

context: Will this headset's game and chat audio work with both next gen consoles? (Xbox One and PS4)
response: Yes I believe so, my good friend has the xbox one and the skull candy slyr headset and he said they do and he loves them to

context: Is this headset also compatible with the Xbox 360?
response: Nope cord doesn't even fit. And 360 mics won't work with this specific mic input. The thing that goes in the controller allows this turtle beach but no 360 mics.

context: Works to place tablet 8.3 inch LG G PAD?
response: I've got room to spare on my Dell Venue 8 Pro, it allows up to 6" I believe. It should work.

context: Hi there, we are looking to purchase a copy of Battlefield 4. Does this come in a premium edition similar to Battlefield 3? thanks Connor.
response: As of right now, there is no prebundled BF4 that has premium access. The premium still needs to be purchesd separately from the game. Im sure as more time passes, EA will release a premium edition game

context: Does this game come with one of those activation code papers inside? I'm considering a used copy.
response: No there's no activation code inside and I think it would be a good idea to get a used one just hope it is in good condition

context: What DLC is not included in this? The Headhunter packs?
response: None of those, and the 72+ Digistruct Peak. Just the 4 DLC, mechro and psycho.Don't forget orcz.com for the golden keys and other prizes.

context: Does it come with game codes or disks?
response: Mine came with one game halo four, headset, one free month of Xbox live a controller and the system

context: i am buying the deluxe set wiiu do i need a pro controller
response: Well i would suggest getting one, it's really awesome and light. However if you don't want one, you don't really need it. Though it would be best to have one.

context: Is it all strictly PvP or is there some PvE as well?
response: There is tons of PvE, in fact I don't care for the PvP part of the game, it is too difficult unless you are with a large group of players.

context: How do I know that the Federal fom did get e-mailed? Didn't see anything in my "sent" e-mail box.
response: I haven't filed yet so I can't speak for this year but in past years, when you e-filed it was sent it via the  H&R; connection not thru your email client.  You should rcv a screen confirmation that you can print out.  Also, you should be able to check status thru H&R.;

context: Will this joy stick work with Microsoft flight sim. X  ?
response: Yes it does, I used it with it.

context: Can it play all Game Gear games?
response: No. It only has the preloaded games. It has no place for game cartridges. There are about half Sega games and half random games that were never on Sega and basically fillers, like card games.

context: will it work on windows 8
response: yes, it works. I have windows 8.1 installed on my PC, it runs smoothly, fully compatible. I played FIFA 13, NFS Run, Hot Pursuit and it works great.

context: does this game is in english version and the characters speak english too???
response: The game comes in English (instructions etc), but the characters speak Japanese with English subtitles.

context: I hit the space bar and it double space. Any fix for this? Thanks
response: Contact steelseries.com customer support, sorry but other than that I don't have an answer.

context: I been using this hard drive for a couple of days, however the Xbox now freezes I pull the hard drive out notice it runs very hot, it is temp problem?
response: My son said that other than the once in a while "regular" freeze of the x-box that he has noticed no abnormal freezing since the install of the hard drive.

context: Is the a Candy Bars Patch?I cannot install cd??Computer just wont open the disc????
response: I installed the CD that I got with the game and had no problems.The only problem I have with the CD is that it hesitates every once in a while.Maybe you could contact IGT slots and see if there is a record of others having problems.

context: Is the end cable USB or do i need a USB dongle for PC use?
response: The end is a USB so it will plug directly into your computer as well as the Xbox, mine works great!

context: can this be played on regular DS?
response: I'm sorry, Becky - no. Yoshi's New Island is only for 3DS and 2DS.

context: Is this mouse good for League of Legends?
response: I have never played it, but for a traditional style mouse I love how it feels. It's pretty big but the buttons feel great. I have yet to play anything that I need to use more than 2 buttons for.

context: do these provide a snug fit on the xbox 360?
response: Not sure as I don't have a Xbox 360 if the dimension of the analog is just like the ps4 joystick then yeah it should... I hope this helps

context: How much is the monthly fee
response: The subscription is $12.99 a month for one character per server, $14.99 for 8 characters per server. You can play as every class on one character, so unless you want an alt for something such a roleplaying or more inventory space, one character is really all you need.
